TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CancellationToken extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 传播有关应取消操作的通知。

span.span: Propagates notification that operations should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个使线程，线程池工作项之间的协作取消或对象。A enables cooperative cancellation between threads, thread pool work items, or objects. 通过实例化创建取消标记对象，该管理取消令牌对象中检索其属性。You create a cancellation token by instantiating a object, which manages cancellation tokens retrieved from its property. 然后将取消标记传递给任意数量的线程、 任务或操作应接收取消通知。You then pass the cancellation token to any number of threads, tasks, or operations that should receive notice of cancellation. 令牌不能用于启动取消。The token cannot be used to initiate cancellation. 当所属对象调用，则的取消标记每个副本上的属性设置为`true`。When the owning object calls , the property on every copy of the cancellation token is set to `true`. 接收通知的对象可以响应中的任何方式适合。The objects that receive the notification can respond in whatever manner is appropriate. 有关详细信息和代码示例请参阅[托管线程中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用的随机数生成器来模拟从 11 个不同的 instruments 读取 10 个整数值的数据收集应用程序。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 零值指示度量已失败的一个检测，这种情况下，应取消操作并没有总体平均值应被计算出来。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要处理可能取消操作，该示例实例化对象，它生成的取消标记传递到对象。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象又取消将标记传递到每个任务负责收集特定乐器的读数。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法来确保只有在已成功收集所有读数后计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果某个任务具有不是因为已取消对调用方法将引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool canceled) cil managed

span.span: The canceled state for the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的令牌将保留在指定的已取消状态`canceled`参数。Tokens created with this constructor will remain in the canceled state specified by the `canceled` parameter. 如果`canceled`是`false`，这两种并将`false`。If `canceled` is `false`, both and will be `false`. 如果`canceled`是`true`，这两种并将`true`。If `canceled` is `true`, both and will be `true`.

public: property bool CanBeCanceled { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取此标记是否能处于已取消状态。

span.span: Gets whether this token is capable of being in the canceled state.

value.span: 如果此令牌能够处于已取消状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this token is capable of being in the canceled state; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将返回`false`，保证，该令牌将永远不会转换为已取消状态，这表示将永远不会返回`true`。If returns `false`, it is guaranteed that the token will never transition into a canceled state, meaning that will never return `true`. 不能取消的取消标记返回的静态属性。A cancellation token that cannot be canceled is returned by the static property. 可以选择使用此属性以确定是否可以为一个取消标记的值之前检查取消属性来确定是否已取消。You can optionally use this property to determine whether a cancellation token can be canceled before examing the value of the property to determine whether it has been canceled.

summary.span: 确定当前的 实例是否等于指定的标记。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance is equal to the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以下条件之一为 true，则两个取消令牌相等：Two cancellation tokens are equal if any one of the following conditions is true: - 它们是具有相同关联。They are associated with the same . - 它们由从公共构造函数，并且其值是否相等。They were both constructed from public constructors, and their values are equal. - 这两个取消标记的值是。The value of both cancellation tokens is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCancellationRequested As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancellationRequested { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取是否已请求取消此标记。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this token.

value.span: 如果此令牌已请求取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this token; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否已请求取消此标记，该令牌最初构造中已取消状态，或通过调用上标记关联的。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token, either through the token initially being constructed in a canceled state, or through calling on the token's associated . 如果此属性为`true`，它只保证已请求取消。If this property is `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它不保证每个已注册处理程序已完成执行，也取消请求已完成传播到所有已注册处理程序。It does not guarantee that every registered handler has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 尤其是在其中将同时取消相关的对象的情况下，可能需要附加的同步。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently. ## Examples 下面是一个简单的示例执行服务器进程，直到属性返回`true`。The following is a simple example that executes a server process until the property returns `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/cs/cancellation.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Threading.Tasks.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested/vb/cancelthreads.vb#12)] 该示例实例化对象，它控制取消令牌的访问权限。The example instantiates a object, which controls access to the cancellation token. 然后，它定义了两个线程过程。It then defines two thread procedures. 第一个定义为池键盘和按下的"C"键时，调用的 lambda 表达式将取消标记为已取消状态。The first is defined as a lambda expression that pools the keyboard and, when the "C" key is pressed, calls to set the cancellation token to the cancelled state. 第二个是参数化的方法， `ServerClass.StaticMethod`，用于执行循环直到属性是`true`。The second is a parameterized method, `ServerClass.StaticMethod`, that executes a loop until the property is `true`. 主线程然后启动两个线程和块，直到执行的线程`ServerClass.StaticMethod`方法终止。The main thread then starts the two threads and blocks until the thread that executes the `ServerClass.StaticMethod` method terminates.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As CancellationToken
public: static property System::Threading::CancellationToken None { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法取消此属性返回的取消标记;也就是说，其属性是`false`。The cancellation token returned by this property cannot be canceled; that is, its property is `false`. 您还可以使用 C# [default(CancellationToken)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default.md)语句以创建一个空取消标记。You can also use the C# [default(CancellationToken)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/default.md) statement to create an empty cancellation token. 两个空取消标记始终是相等的。Two empty cancellation tokens are always equal.

span.span: Registers a delegate that will be called when this is canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration Register(class System.Action callback) cil managed
Public Function Register (callback As Action) As CancellationTokenRegistration

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在取消 时执行的委托。

span.span: The delegate to be executed when the is canceled.

summary.span: 注册一个将在取消此 时调用的委托。

span.span: Registers a delegate that will be called when this is canceled.

returns.span: 可用于注销回调的 实例。

span.span: The instance that can be used to unregister the callback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此令牌已处于已取消状态，立即并以同步方式将运行该委托。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 委托生成的任何异常将传播出此方法调用。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 当前与委托一起捕获并将执行它时使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 当前不捕获。The current is not captured.

related.span: 如何：注册取消请求的回调

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此令牌已处于已取消状态，立即并以同步方式将运行该委托。If this token is already in the canceled state, the delegate will be run immediately and synchronously. 委托生成的任何异常将传播出此方法调用。Any exception the delegate generates will be propagated out of this method call. 当前与委托一起捕获并将执行它时使用。The current is captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 如果`useSynchronizationContext`是`true`，当前，一个存在、 是否与委托一起还捕获，将执行它时使用。If `useSynchronizationContext` is `true`, the current , if one exists, is also captured along with the delegate and will be used when executing it. 否则为不捕获。Otherwise, is not captured.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 如果已请求取消此标记，则引发 。

span.span: Throws a if this token has had cancellation requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了功能等效于：This method provides functionality equivalent to: C#C# ```csharp if (token.IsCancellationRequested) throw new OperationCanceledException(token); ``` ```vb If token.IsCancellationRequested Then Throw New OperationCanceledException(token) End If ```

span.span: The token has had cancellation requested.

related.span: 如何：取消任务及其子级

span.span: How to: Cancel a Task and Its Children

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WaitHandle As WaitHandle
public: property System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ WaitHandle { System::Threading::WaitHandle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在取消标记时收到信号的 。

span.span: Gets a that is signaled when the token is canceled.

value.span: 在取消标记时收到信号的 。

span.span: A that is signaled when the token is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问此属性会导致要实例化。Accessing this property causes a to be instantiated. 最好仅使用此属性，如有必要，，然后释放关联尽早 (disposing 源将释放此分配的句柄) 的实例。It is preferable to only use this property when necessary, and to then dispose the associated instance at the earliest opportunity (disposing the source will dispose of this allocated handle). 不应关闭或直接释放该句柄。The handle should not be closed or disposed directly.

related.span: 如何：侦听具有等待句柄的取消请求

span.span: How to: Listen for Cancellation Requests That Have Wait Handles
